vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὄξος, εος, τό,
(ὀξύς) poor wine, 'vin ordinaire', [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 vinegar made therefrom, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐς τὰς ῥῖνας ὄ. ἐγχέων, as a mode of torture, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__3 metaphorically, of a sour fellow, χὡνὴρ ὄ. ἅπαν [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
wine vinegar
vinegar; a wine of sharp flavor, posca, which was an ordinary beverage, and was often mixed with bitter herbs, etc., and this given to the condemned criminals in order to stupefy them, and lessen their sufferings, Mt. 27:48; Mk. 15:36; Lk. 23:36; Jn. 19:29, 30
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 酸酒, 酒醋 (比水更解渴,也比酒便宜,所以是中下階層的飲料)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 酸酒, 酒醋 (比水更解渴,也比酒便宜,所以是中下阶层的饮料)
